## Random notes

```
0 > cd /pci@80000000/mac-io@3/escc-legacy/ch-a  ok
0 > .properties
name                      "ch-a"
device_type               "serial"
compatible                "chrp,es4"
reg                       00012004   00000001
                          00012006   00000001
                          0001200a   00000001
AAPL,address              81092004
AAPL,interrupts           f
 ok
```

Boot without a binary target

Testing we can write to register and our binary is loading.
